department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: A new office/kitchen prefabricated structure is required for the CHORD project at Dominion Radio Astrophysical Observatory
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### 31034-238842 - Field Office Building
#### *Bureau local de terrain*

**Reference Number**: WS3893406181-Doc3917847296
**Solicitation Number**: WS3893406181

#### Tender Details
- **Publication Date**: April 19, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: May 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Date**: May 3, 2023

#### Project Description
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) requires the supply and installation of a prefabricated office/kitchen structure for the Canadian Hydrogen Observatory for Radio-Transient Detectors (CHORD) project at the Dominion Radio Astrophysical Observatory (DRAO). 

#### Contract Details
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Applicable
- **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2024
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User Entity**: National Research Council of Canada (NRC)

#### Selection Criteria
Tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements
This opportunity is open to companies that are signatories to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Delivery
This opportunity is open to bidders based in the province of British Columbia.

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Shaylan Stein, Acquisition Specialist, 
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Note: The procurement details are publicly available at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16046726?extsite=MTYwNDY3MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16046726?extsite=MTYwNDY3MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).  (Please use a link
